message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. I think you'll really love it! I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  $150 is a bit steep for me.  I'd be willing to pay $110 for the product.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you in the middle. I can offer you the product for $130.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $130 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with. How about $115? I'm really interested in this product, and I think this is a fair price for both of us.
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $125, but that's as low as I'm willing to go.
